title: MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage | Awesome Arcade Hamster Home (White) | 18.11 x 11.61 x 21.26 Inch
descriptions:
Introducing the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage - Awesome Arcade Hamster Home in White! This spacious and versatile hamster cage is perfect for providing a comfortable and entertaining habitat for your furry friend.

With dimensions measuring 18.11 inches in length, 11.61 inches in width, and 21.26 inches in height, this cage offers plenty of space for your hamster to play, sleep, and explore. The cage weighs 6.1 pounds, making it lightweight and easy to move around.

The Awesome Arcade Hamster Home comes in a sleek and stylish white color, adding a touch of modernity to any room. It includes essential accessories such as an exercise wheel, water bottle, food bowl, nesting nook, and interior play tubes, ensuring that your hamster has everything it needs for a happy and active lifestyle.

Featuring a multi-level play space, your hamster can climb, jump, and explore different levels within the cage. The deep base design allows for ample bedding to provide a cozy and comfortable environment. The top door access makes it easy to interact with your hamster and perform routine maintenance tasks.

The upper cover of the cage is removable, allowing for convenient cleaning and customization. The modular design enables you to add or remove connector pieces, providing endless possibilities for creating unique hamster habitats. The cage is also compatible with standard play tubes, further enhancing your hamster's playtime experience.

Assembling the cage is a breeze, and no tools are required. Simply follow the included instructions, and your hamster will have a new home in no time. Plus, with a manufacturer's warranty of 1 year, you can have peace of mind knowing that your purchase is protected.

Upgrade your hamster's living space with the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage - Awesome Arcade Hamster Home in White. Order now and give your furry friend the ultimate hamster paradise!
